definition: to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.english: Trees were cut down, but none were planted.
sentences.chinese: 树木被滥砍滥伐，新树却无人栽种。

sentences.english: Ecological inbalance is caused by the deforestation denudation in this country.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家滥伐森林，造成生态失调。

sentences.english: There are various ideas about how to rein in deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 如何严格管束滥砍滥伐有各种各样的想法。

sentences.english: The flood is caused by cutting too much trees.
sentences.chinese: 洪水是由于滥伐林木造成的。

sentences.english: Poor planning deforested the area in several years.
sentences.chinese: 因规划很差，这地区的树林几年内已被乱砍滥伐。

sentences.english: Deforestation erodes whole layers of soil into the ocean every year.
sentences.chinese: 滥伐森林导致每年整个土壤层都流失到海里去了。

sentences.english: The amended law also grants some amnesties for previous deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 修改的法律也赦免了一些以前因滥伐入狱的人。

sentences.english: The deforestation of this country caused ecological imbalance.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家滥伐森林，造成生态失调。

sentences.english: The country ....caused the imbalance of environment.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家滥伐森林，造成生态失调。

sentences.english: The deforestation has to be stopped there.
sentences.chinese: 必须要阻止在这儿滥砍滥伐的人。

sentences.english: Chopsticks add to a plague of regional deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 木筷加重了滥砍滥伐的灾难。

sentences.english: Carbon reduction through reforestation and avoided deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 通过植树造林和避免乱砍滥伐减少碳排放。

sentences.english: We must safeguard forest timber and stop over-lumbering.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须保护森林木材，停止滥伐。

sentences.english: Because people take the excessive use of non-section of deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们取之无度，用之无节的滥伐树木。

sentences.english: People are cutting down trees even though it is illegal.
sentences.chinese: 尽管乱砍滥伐是违法的人们还是砍倒树木。

sentences.english: Sustainable forest management and avoided deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 可持续的林业管理和避免乱砍滥伐的活动。

definition: to mine (or harvest, log, trap animals etc) illegally/illegal mining (or logging etc)
hilly land allotted for private use
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
to clear waste land or forest by burning/slash-and-burn (agriculture)
